TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VisualTransition extends System.Windows.DependencyObject

summary.span: 表示當控制項由某個狀態轉換到另一個狀態時發生的視覺化行為。

span.span: Represents the visual behavior that occurs when a control transitions from one state to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由新增狀態之間轉換時，您可以指定控制項的視覺行為物件。You can specify the visual behavior of a control when it transitions between states by adding objects. 當您建立，您指定一或多個項目：When you create a , you specify one or more of the following: - 藉由設定發生的狀態之間轉換所需的時間屬性。The time it takes for a transition between states to occur by setting the property. - 發生在轉換時所設定的其他控制項的外觀變更屬性。Additional changes in the control's appearance that occur at the time of the transition by setting the property. - 當藉由設定會套用和屬性。When the is applied by setting the and properties. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，指定當使用者移動滑鼠離開該控制項，為藍色，然後為黃色，然後為黑色在 1.5 秒內變更控制項的框線。The following example creates a that specifies that when the user moves the mouse away from the control, the control's border changes to blue, then to yellow, and then to black in 1.5 seconds. 完整的範例，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). [!code-xaml[VSMButtonTemplate#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmbuttontemplate/csharp/skinnedbutton.xaml#8)]

summary.span: 取得或設定轉換前的 名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the to transition from.
The name of the to transition from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是選擇性的。The property is optional. A可以限制套用至特定的狀態，或它可以套用任何時候控制項之間的轉換狀態。A can be restricted to apply to only certain states or it can be applied any time the control transitions between states. 您可以限制何時藉由設定會套用和屬性。You restrict when a is applied by setting the and properties. 下表說明限制的層級 (依最嚴格到最不嚴格的順序排列)。The following table describes the levels of restriction from most restrictive to least restrictive. |限制的類型Type of restriction|來源的值Value of From|目標的值Value of To| |-------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |從指定的狀態到另一個指定的狀態From a specified state to another specified state|名稱 The name of a |名稱 The name of a | |從任何狀態到指定的狀態From any state to a specified state|未設定Not set|名稱 The name of a | |從指定的狀態到任何狀態From a specified state to any state|名稱 The name of a |未設定Not set| |從任何狀態到任何其他狀態From any state to any other state|未設定Not set|未設定Not set| 您可以有多個中的物件，參考相同的狀態，但它們將使用上表指定的順序。You can have multiple objects in a that refer to the same state, but they will be used in the order that the previous table specifies. 您可以變更此行為，藉由建立新的類別繼承自，並覆寫方法。You can change this behavior by creating a new class that inherits from and overriding the method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個物件。The following example creates two objects. 當控制項從不`Pressed`狀態`MouseOver`狀態，同時具有和集使用。When the control transitions from the `Pressed` state to the `MouseOver` state, the that has both and set is used. 當控制項從不是 `Pressed` 的狀態轉換到 `MouseOver` 狀態時，則會使用另一個狀態。When the control transitions from a state that is not `Pressed` to the `MouseOver` state, the other state is used. [!code-xaml[VSMButtonTemplate#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmbuttontemplate/csharp/skinnedbutton.xaml#7)]

summary.span: 取得或設定從某個狀態轉換到另一個狀態所需的時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the time that it takes to move from one state to another.

value.span: 從某個狀態轉換到另一個狀態所需的時間。

span.span: The time that it takes to move from one state to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定多久轉換會藉由設定屬性。You can specify how long a transition takes by setting the property. 當您將設定屬性，指定進行轉換所花費的時間。When you set the property, you are specifying the time that it takes for the transition to occur. ## Examples 下列範例會指定控制項需要進入二分之一秒`MouseOver`狀態。The following example specifies that the control takes one half second to go into the `MouseOver` state. 完整的範例，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). [!code-xaml[VSMButtonTemplate#MouseOverTransition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmbuttontemplate/csharp/skinnedbutton.xaml#mouseovertransition)]

summary.span: 取得或設定用於轉換狀態的自訂數學公式。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom mathematical formula that is used to transition between states.

value.span: 用於轉換狀態的自訂數學公式。

span.span: A custom mathematical formula that is used to transition between states.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定屬性來指定發生轉換的方式。You can set the property to specify the way a transition occurs. 例如，您可以指定要加速或減速轉換 easing 函式。For example, you can specify an easing function to accelerate or decelerate the transition. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Easing 函式](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/easing-functions.md)。For more information, see [Easing Functions](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/easing-functions.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立這會導致垂直移動，當使用者按下滑鼠按鈕，透過。The following example creates a that causes a to move vertically when the user presses the mouse button over the . 範例會設定屬性，以物件會造成彈到達其目的地時出現。The example sets the property to a object to cause the to appear to bounce when it reaches its destination. 當使用者放開時用了另一個物件會造成來回傳送之前它會傳回其原始位置。The that is used when the user releases the button has another object to cause the to bounce before it returns to its original position. [!code-xaml[VSMCustomControl#VSMEasingFunction](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/window1.xaml#vsmeasingfunction)] 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式和事件。The following example shows the event handler for the and events. 此範例會呼叫方法，以變更的畫布。The example calls the method to change the of the canvas. [!code-csharp[VSMCustomControl#VSMEasingFunctionLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#vsmeasingfunctionlogic)] [!code-vb[VSMCustomControl#VSMEasingFunctionLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#vsmeasingfunctionlogic)]

summary.span: 取得或設定會於轉換發生時發生的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that occurs when the transition occurs.

value.span: 會於轉換發生時發生的 。

span.span: The that occurs when the transition occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當包含，則執行套用。When a contains a , the runs any time the is applied. 例如，如果您想要的框線若要變更色彩，當使用者移動滑鼠開時，您可以建立具有變更按鈕的背景。For example, if you want the border of a to change colors when the user moves the mouse away from it, you can create a that has a that changes the button's background. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，指定當使用者移動滑鼠離開該控制項，為藍色，然後為黃色，然後為黑色在 1.5 秒內變更控制項的框線。The following example creates a that specifies that when the user moves the mouse away from the control, the control's border changes to blue, then to yellow, and then to black in 1.5 seconds. 完整的範例，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
